name: Prem Pritam
title: Research Scientist
homepage_quote:
If you’re gonna design cities,

let’s do it right!
homepage_about: I'm Prem Pritam, a Scientist specialized in Environmental & Climate Studies based in Delaware, USA. I believe that thoughtfully designed spaces have the power to transform communities, shaping not just the built environment but the lives of people who inhabit it. My work spans sustainable planning, housing, and public space design—always with a focus on resilience, inclusivity, and lasting impact.
about_me:
